subject: Thank you for your refinance loan request, we are accepting your debt request
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this tender will expire THIS EVENING):
$297,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://typinfanny.com/
